 We recognize that people come with a wealth of experience and talent. Diversity of experience and skills combined with passion is a key to innovation and excellence. Therefore, we encourage people from all backgrounds to apply to our positions.
   

  

**We offer:**
* Flexible working hours
* Professional onboarding and training options
* Powerful team looking forward to working with you
* Career coaching and development opportunities


 The Sales Engineer is responsible for actively promoting the company’s solutions for municipal water applications, a part that drives significant impact on the organization. The water industry in Sweden is growing in the coming years and Hach needs talent who are enthusiastic about being part of our growth journey.
   

  

 This position is part of the Hach team in Sweden and will be working remotely preferably located within the Stockholm area. At Hach, our vision is to provide valuable insights for experts in water and weather applications to help protect lives, the environment and infrastructure. You will be part of a culture working under the motto “Best team wins” where “Fun” and “Successful” go hand in hand. Hach is a global company with a tradition of recognizing and promoting ambitious people.
   

  

**In this role, you will have the opportunity to:**
* Perform all sales activities within assigned regions/customers to meet company objectives. Customer on-site visits are essential, virtual Teams meetings, trade shows, product demonstrations and customer seminars.
* Develop and execute sales action plans, identifying sales objectives, sales opportunities, and major customers.
* Prepare regular sales data such as forecasts and maintain customer activity files in the CRM system (Salesforce)
* Meet or exceed monthly or annual targets in assigned areas of responsibility.


**The essential requirements of the job include:**
* A degree in Analytical Chemistry, Biology, Environment Sciences or Engineering. Alternate degrees or work experiences will be considered.
* Experience in solution selling in the Swedish market.
* Comfortable in representing solutions that are technical in nature, with experience gained in a technical environment.
* Must have a valid driving license and be willing and able to travel within the region.
* Strong influencing, negotiation, and communication skills in the Swedish language.


**It would be a plus if you also possess previous experience in:**
* Knowledge and experience within the water industry.


 At Hach (
 **Hach Careers** 
 ), we ensure water quality for people around the world, and every associate plays a vital role in that mission. Our founding vision is to make water analysis better—faster, simpler, greener, and more informative. We accomplish this through teamwork, customer partnerships, passionate experts, and reliable, easy-to-use solutions.
   

  

 As part of our team, you’ll make an immediate, measurable impact on a global scale by enabling the world’s everyday water needs. You’ll also belong to a respectful and collaborative community that fosters career growth and professional development. You’ll be supported by resources that make a positive difference in your life because, at Hach, we value your authenticity and want your talents to shine.
   

  

 At Veralto, we value diversity and the existence of similarities and differences, both visible and not, found in our workforce, workplace and throughout the markets we serve. Our associates, customers and shareholders contribute unique and different perspectives as a result of these diverse attributes.
   

  

 If you’ve ever wondered what’s within you, there’s no better time to find out.

title: Sales Manager- Nordics
Cloud Platform Engineer / DevOps engineer to ABAX Norway / Sweden / Poland
description:
Jobbify är en jobbplattform för vassa kandidater.
  
För kunds räkning har vi publicerat denna annons, vill du komma i kontakt med den slutgiltiga arbetsgivaren kan du klicka dig vidare till annonsen:
  
  

Join us on our mission to deliver mobility data insights that empower people to do more with less! At ABAX, we're transforming the telematics industry in Europe. We help businesses with mobile workforces work smarter by reducing costs, optimizing operations, and improving sustainability, efficiency, and safety.
  
  

Ready to craft the future of cloud infrastructure with us? Become the architect of secure, scalable, and resilient systems that drive our business objectives forward. Dive into the world of optimized operations, where minimizing expenses and maximizing efficiency define your path to success!
  
  

**Some of the other things you will be working on:**  

Design, implement, and manage cloud infrastructure using platforms such as Google Cloud Platform, AWS, or Azure.
  
  

Serve as an approver and quality gate for merge requests (MRs) submitted by developers to introduce new infrastructure using Terraform.
  
  

Monitor and optimize cloud infrastructure performance, security, and cost.
  
  

Implement best practices for cloud security, including identity and access management, encryption, and network security.
  
  

Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to cloud infrastructure and applications.
  
  

Participate in development operations on-duty rotation.
  
  

**Nice-to-have:**  

Understanding of security or networking concepts and protocols is preferred but not mandatory.
  
  

Previous experience in DevOps is a plus
  
  

What's in it for you?
  
  

We understand that a happy employee is a productive one. That's why we offer competitive benefits such as Multisport membership, flexible working hours, and occasional remote work options. Your well-being is paramount, supported by private healthcare, insurance, and a pension plan.
  
  

**We believe you have:**  

Relevant BSc in tech/IT, software development, or other relevant field.
  
  

Relevant experience as a Cloud Platform Engineer or SRE Engineer or similar role.
  
  

Strong proficiency in cloud platforms such as Google Cloud Platform, AWS, or Azure
  
  

Experience with infrastructure-as-code tools such as Terraform or Ansible.
  
  

Proficiency in one of the programming languages such as Python, Go, or .Net, and scripting languages such as Bash or PowerShell.
  
  

Knowledge of containerization and orchestration technologies such as Docker and/or Kubernetes.
  
  

Familiarity with centralized monitoring and logging tools.
  
  

**Personal attributes:**  

Discover a role crafted for someone who thrives on our four core values: enthusiastic, customer-centric, innovative, and sustainable. Approach challenges with an analytical mindset and a keen eye for detail.
  
  

We envision a candidate who finds energy in cross-team collaboration, seamlessly navigating through different departments and geographies. At ABAX, we celebrate teamwork and motivation for cooperation across teams, departments, and geographies, where being a team player is the key to our ongoing success. Picture yourself in a position that sparks your curiosity, encourages working smarter, and values continuous feedback for your growth.
  
  

**Other information:**  

**Start date:** As soon as possible / As agreed.
  
  

**Work extent:** Full time.
  
  

**Remote Status:** Fully remote
  
  

**Location:** While this position is ideally based in one of the following three countries: Norway, Sweden or Poland.
  
  

**Our hiring process:**  

1. We do look at your resume when some kind of experience is required but – and then conduct a short phone call where we ensure that our goals are aligned. In addition, find out a little bit more about who you are and why you are interested in this position.
  
  

2. We send out our technical test, focusing on how you approach the work.
  
  

3. In-depth interview with one or two of our stake holders, could be a team member for example – to get to know each other even better. At this stage, we deep dive into the technical test that you have done.
  
  

4. Second interview with the hiring manager and our recruitment specialist – focusing even more on who you are and also – what you know.
  
  

5. Digital reference check through our supplier RefApp
  
  

6. Offer and celebration!

title: DevOps konsult
description:
Är du passionerad för DevOps och ser molnteknik som din kreativa arena? Har du en vision likt vår om att skapa nästa nivå av intelligenta system? Oavsett om det är ChatGPT, Gemini, eller Stable Diffusion som fångar din fantasi, så värderar vi din drivkraft att växa med teknologins framsteg – utan att ge avkall på våra gemensamma värderingar.
   

  

**Checka in vad du kommer att göra:**
 I denna konsultroll kommer du vara vår superspindel i DevOps-nätet och bana vägen för spännande möjligheter inom Cloud och systemutveckling. Dina krafter ska användas för att leda och dyka in i diverse projekt hos våra kunder och “in house”. Tillsammans med både vårt och kundens team kommer du stötta och skapa suveräna resultat. Det bästa? Du kommer ständigt utvecklas och ha roligt!
   

  

**Vi önskar oss:**
* Minst 8 års erfarenhet inom IT branschen
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta som konsult
* Kunskaper inom infrastruktur och utveckling.
* Ett brinnande intresse för DevOps/DevSecOps och övriga teknologier som kryddar ditt arbete.
* Grymma kommunikationsfärdigheter på svenska, då det är viktigt i vårt dagliga arbete.


 Kunskap inom IT-säkerhet är alltid en värdefull tillgång i vårt team. Eftersom vi både vill skapa ihop och ha roligt på jobbet lägger vi också stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper. Vi uppskattar exempelvis lite humor, förmågan till eget ansvar och viljan att utmanas.
   

  

**Vem är vi?**
 B3 Kodify är proffs på Cloud-teknologier som AWS, Azure och GCP samt metoder som DevOps/DevSecOps. Vi strävar efter att ligga i framkant när det kommer till moderna arbetssätt och vi älskar att krydda till det med nya verktyg och tekniker som t.ex. Containers, moln, infrastruktur som kod osv. Vi är grymma på att hjälpa våra kunder att lyfta sina IT-koncept!
   

  

 Hos oss är måndagar lika uppskattade som fredagar! Vår hemlighet? Vi prioriterar glädje, gemenskap och oförglömliga upplevelser - vare sig det är via en chatt på Slack eller genom våra gemensamma äventyr och afterworks. Och om det inte vore nog, erbjuder vi konkurrenskraftiga löner, flexibilitet i vardagen och oändliga chanser för din personliga och professionella tillväxt. Gör varje dag till en anledning att fira med oss!
   

  

 Tryck på ansökningsknappen redan idag och låt oss mötas! Vi tar inte emot duvor med brev längre, men om du har frågor så är du mer än välkommen att kontakta Melinda via mejl: melinda.andersson@b3.se.
   

  

**Ser fram emot att höra från dig!**
*B3 Kodify är en del av B3-koncernen och utnämndes till Sveriges tredje bästa arbetsplats 2021 av Great Place to Work. Vi är också stolta över att vara Sveriges IT Karriärföretag 2022. Vi lever och andas våra värdeord: erfarenhet, olikheter och energi, och strävar efter hållbarhet i allt vi gör. Vi tror också att glada anställda presterar bäst och därför har vi regelbundna wellness-aktiviteter, från yoga och simning till musikquiz, stickcafé och föreläsningar om stress och mental hälsa.*

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
**Företagsbeskrivning**
 AFRY erbjuder tjänster inom teknik, design, digitalisering och rådgivning. Vi är hängivna experter inom industri, energi- och infrastruktur, som skapar värde för kommande generationer. AFRY har en global räckvidd med djupa rötter i Norden. Tillsammans accelererar vi omställningen till ett mer hållbart samhälle.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
 Vi förstärker just nu vårt Stockholmsteam och söker en DevOps Engineer. Stockholmskontoret har ett brett spektrum av interna projekt för att utveckla produkter inom flera olika verksamheter. Detta inkluderar både nationella och internationella kunder som vi levererar storskaliga åtaganden till.
   

  

 Som DevOps Engineer och konsult hos oss ingår du i CI/CD-teamet inom sektionen DevOps Platform. Teamets uppdrag är att hjälpa olika befintliga och nya projekt att sätta upp sin infrastruktur baserat på projektspecifika behov.
   

  

 Du kommer att arbeta i en dynamisk miljö där du får möjlighet att arbeta med olika projekt/tekniska lösningar, utforska, designa och bygga arkitektur för olika typer av applikationer hos olika kunder.
   

  

 Matchar din profil nedan? I så fall är du välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

**Kvalifikationer**
 Vi söker någon med nedanstående kunskaper och erfarenheter, men vi tror dock att du kan vara en intressant kandidat även om du inte uppfyller alla kriterier.
   

  

* Flera års praktisk erfarenhet av Linux-hantering och skriptning
* Några års praktisk erfarenhet av Azure DevOps (infra) relaterade tjänster.
* God erfarenhet av shellskript, Makefiles, YAML, och helst andra programmeringsspråk
* Erfarenhet av att designa och utveckla CI/CD-miljöer
* Erfarenheter av att designa, implementera och hantera CI/CD-pipelines på Gitlab, GitHub, Jenkins och Azure
* Erfarenhet av containers och molntekniker (t.ex. Docker, Kubernetes, AWS)
* Applikationsdistributionsarkitektur via Docker och TLS-certifikatshantering för produktionsmiljöer
* Arkitekturkunskap om frontend-teknologier som Angular/React, backend-teknologier som .NET Core/C#/Java samt databaser och meddelandelösningar
* Erfarenhet av felsökning, t.ex. brandväggsinställningar, serverproblem, trafik mellan servrar
* God förståelse för DNS, routing, lastbalansering, nätverk och brandväggsteknik
* Flytande svenska i tal och skrift


 Vi lägger även stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper som vi tror bland annat kännetecknas av att du är en Team player som tycker om att ta ansvar, kan arbeta självständigt och har ett öga för detaljer.
   

  

**Välkommen med din ansökan, sista ansökningsdag är 2024-06-28**
**Ytterligare information**
**Vad erbjuder AFRY dig som anställd?**
 Vi har regelbundna träffar där temat varierar mellan kompetens och socialt utbyte, eller både och. En bra balans helt enkelt!
   

  

 Du får du t.ex.:
   

  

* En AFRY Buddy som bollplank under din första tid som anställd
* Vi arbetar aktivt med vår strategi för löpande utveckling för våra konsulter. Detta sker genom kompetensutvecklingsprojekt, seminarier, utbildningar, samarbeten etc.
* Balans i arbetslivet med möjlighet till hybridarbete.
* Tillgång till Club AFRY där en bredd av spännande och underhållande aktiviteter för våra medarbetare anordnas - det finns något för alla! Läs gärna mer här.
* Konkurrenskraftiga förmåner gällande pension, friskvård och föräldraledighet reglerade i vårt kollektivavtal
* Företagsrabatter med externa partners genom vår förmånsportal Advantage You.
* Friskvårdsbidrag 3000 SEK/år.
* Restauranger och kaféer på plats
* Ett enormt nätverk av tekniska experter med +19 000 kollegor runtom i världen.


**Kontaktpersoner för frågor:**
 Aamir Faried, rekryterande chef
   

  

 Aamir.faried@afry.com
   

  

 Rebecka Gravås, rekryteringspartner
   

  

 rebecka.gravas@afry.com
   

  

**Om rekryteringsprocessen** 
 :
   

  

 I alla våra rekryteringsprocesser använder vi oss av kompetensbaserad rekrytering - för en rättvis och träffsäker rekrytering.
   

  

* Telefonavstämning eller urvalsfrågor via mejl
* Intervjusteg 1 (IRL eller på Teams)
* Intervjusteg 2 (IRL eller på Teams)
* (Eventuellt tester: tekniskt, problemlösning, personlighet)
* Referenstagning
* Erbjudande


*Vi undanber oss direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt säljare av ytterligare jobbannonser.*
*På AFRY driver vi förändring i allt vi gör. Vi anser att förändring sker när modiga idéer möts, när vi samarbetar, skapar innovation och omfamnar kreativa lösningar, det är så vi skapar framtiden. Vi söker konstant kvalificerade kandidater som vill ansluta sig till våra inkluderande team runt om i världen. Bli en del av oss och påskynda den gröna omställningen*

title: Senior DevOps Engineer
description:
At Broadridge, we've built a culture where the highest goal is to empower others to accomplish more. If you’re passionate about developing your career, while helping others along the way, come join the Broadridge team.
   

  

 We are looking for a Senior DevOps Engineer to join our Engineering team in Stockholm. You will be responsible for the deployment of our Tbricks trading platform.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Participate in the development of C++ financial markets software through the whole lifecycle from commit to deployment.
* Work in collaboration with development and QA teams to automate the build, test, and deployment processes.
* Develop and maintain internal and client-facing Python tooling and services.
* Provide and receive technical feedback via well-established code-review practices.
* Promote and enforce best practices in our development teams.


**Profile Needed**
***Mandatory:***
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related STEM field.
* At least 5 years of experience in DevOps or C++ software engineering.
* Proficiency in Python
* Excellent Linux administration skills
* Experience with CI/CD systems (e.g. Bamboo, Jenkins)
* Experience with Infrastructure as Code tools (e.g. Ansible, Puppet, Terraform)
* Experience with containerization technologies (e.g. Docker Swarm, Kubernetes)
* Experience with monitoring technologies (e.g. Prometheus, OpenTelemetry)
* Great communication skills, with an ability to collaborate effectively across diverse teams.


*Beneficial:*
* Experience with C++ build systems (e.g. CMake, Bazel), understanding of the compilation process and tooling ecosystem.
* Background in C++ development
* Experience with Ansible
* Experience with RPM specs and yum repositories


**Hybrid Flexible at Broadridge**
 We are made up of high-performing teams that meet in person to learn and collaborate as needed. This role is considered hybrid, which means you’ll be assigned to a Broadridge office and given the flexibility to work remote.
   

  

 Broadridge associates helped us envision our Connected Workplace - a work model that allows associates around the globe, dependent upon their role responsibilities, take advantage of the benefits of both on-site and off-site work to support our clients, one another, and the communities where we live and work. Our Connected Workplace is grounded in the concept of FACS: Flexible, Accountable, Connected, and Supported, which is our commitment to our associates. FACS supports our strong culture and allows us to achieve business goals while supporting meaningful work-life integration for our associates.
   

  

 We are dedicated to fostering a diverse, equitable, and inclusive environment and committed to providing a workplace that empowers associates to be authentic and bring their best to work. We believe that associates can only do their best when they feel safe, understood, and valued, and we work diligently and collaboratively to ensure Broadridge is a company—and ultimately a community—that recognizes and celebrates diversity in all its dimensions.

title: Senior IT Architect - Stockholm | BCG Platinion
description:
For our Stockholm office, we are looking for Senior IT Architects to help our clients on national and international projects!
   

  

 (Senior) IT Architects are part of our consulting teams who focus for instance on tech-oriented analyses, review & specification of IT systems or architectures, technical solution design, process improvement and target architecture definitions.
   

  

 Together with colleagues from BCG Platinion and/or the Boston Consulting Group, you will develop superior IT strategies, concepts, and solutions actively and on site, applying your technical know-how combined with your analytical and conceptual skillset. Based on your IT project experience, you are able to provide content guidance to and coordinate smaller teams.
   

  

**Shape the world of tomorrow**
* You will form the digital transformation of globally leading companies, ensuring their success by evaluating our clients' digital capabilities and performing feasibility studies
* You will manage small, agile development teams in strategic IT implementation programs, establish modern practices like DevOps and CI/CD, and be responsible for the technical implementation of crucial digital requirements, such as cyber resilience
* You will analyze, develop, and optimize cutting-edge, customized IT architectures while leading small teams and applying your comprehensive understanding of legacy IT, enterprise solutions, and current market developments and trends such as cloud computing and microservices


**You can help us make a difference if you**
* completed a university degree in computer science, informatics, engineering, or a related discipline with higher-than-average grades
* bring a minimum of four years relevant experience in IT consulting, management of IT projects, or professional software development
* have led project teams of more than three people
* know that modern tools, such as machine learning, cyber resilience, DevOps, agile methods, AI, and robotics aren't just buzzwords - but essential to sustainable IT architectures
* are familiar with popular software development methods and tools
* feel particularly comfortable in interdisciplinary teams and global contexts - while traveling to our clients in- and outside of your home country
* are on a fluent level of understanding and communicating complex topics in English


**How To Grow With Us**
 We guarantee constant development incentives in an open and rewarding work environment! Together with a dedicated team of talented colleagues, you get to work on new challenges every day. Individual training offers and a culture of open feedback will provide the framework needed to explore and perfect personal strengths. Our modern structures allow focusing on the essence of our work - with easy travel booking, an excellent back-office support and comprehensive Knowledge Center. With our regular office Fridays and legendary events, we cultivate a strong and close team network beyond our case work.
   

  

*BCG Platinion is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable.*

title: AI Team Lead
description:
Are you looking for a role within an exciting world of AI technologies, where you can both contribute with your expertise and keep on developing?
   

  

 We are starting a new chapter within ASSA ABLOY’s organization, and we are looking for top talent to help us grow our AI Technical Development Teams from scratch.
   

  

 Join our Team in Stockholm, Sweden and enjoy a collaborative culture that empowers you to build a career you can be proud of.
   

  

**What would you do as our AI Team Lead?**
 You will play a key role, acting as a business advisor, interfacing with multiple stakeholders, business, and product owners within entire ASSA ABLOY structure. You would be part of our brand-new project related to AI Technical Development Team of 6, based in Stockholm.
   

  

 We work in cross-functional teams, responsible for developing modern, secure and top-quality solutions. We develop embedded applications and integrate them with Mobile Applications, Electronic Access Control software using cloud and microservice architecture.
   

  

**You would also:**
* Stay up-to-date with the latest AI technologies
* Be responsible for hands-on R&D Development
* Interact with tech - and non-tech stakeholders, shaping how we set up best approach for realizing new use cases from business


**The Skills And Experience You Need**
 We are looking for someone who:
   

  

* has several years of experience with designing both application architecture and cloud architecture (Azure or AWS)
* has previous DevOps and testing experience
* is up-to-date with AI solutions and will be eager to promote AI best practices and processes across global cross-functional Teams
* is experienced in leading and organizing DevOps teams working in an agile environment
* is fluent in English, spoken and written


**What We Offer**
 We’re passionate about providing amazing opportunities and benefits, so you can continue and progress a lifelong career with us – here’s what we have to offer:
   

  

* Learning and career development opportunities, whether it’s online learning, management training or enhancing your skills
* A competitive salary and incentive schemes
* Hybrid model of working
* Flexible working hours
* Stable employment in a friendly international atmosphere


**We review applications regularly, so don’t wait.**
 We are building diverse, inclusive teams, and encourage applications from everyone who can see themselves working with us. Just set up your profile and apply here, no later than 30th June 2024.
   

  

 To make sure your personal data is safe, we don’t look at any applications sent by email or post. If you have any questions about the role or the process, email Khalil Kabakibi, Talent Acquisition Business Partner, at khalil.kabakibi@assaabloy.com.
   

  

 Let’s create a safer and more open world - together!
   

  

 To find out more about us, visit www.assaabloy.com
   

  

**We are the ASSA ABLOY Group**
 Our people have made us the global leader in access solutions. In return, we open doors for them wherever they go. With nearly 61,000 colleagues in more than 70 different countries, we help billions of people experience a more open world. Our innovations make all sorts of spaces – physical and virtual – safer, more secure, and easier to access.
   

  

 As an employer, we value results – not titles, or backgrounds. We empower our people to build their career around their aspirations and our ambitions – supporting them with regular feedback, training, and development opportunities. Our colleagues think broadly about where they can make the most impact, and we encourage them to grow their role locally, regionally, or even internationally.
   

  

 As we welcome new people on board, it’s important to us to have diverse, inclusive teams, and we value different perspectives and experiences.

title: Support Specialist D365 F&O
description:
Är du serviceinriktad, har ett strukturerat arbetssätt och brinner du för nöjda kunder? Har du erfarenhet av att jobba med ERP-lösningar? Då kan det vara dig vi söker till rollen som Support Specialist!
   

  

**Ditt uppdrag**
 I rollen som Support Specialist inom Dynamics Customer Success kommer du att vara vår single point of contact för samtliga kunders supportärenden. Du kommer vara en ”spindel i nätet” inom Customer Success organisationen där du har daglig dialog och kontakt med våra kunder. Du kommer jobba nära och ha en tät dialog med våra kundteam (service managers och konsulter) med syfte att ge bästa möjliga kundsupport och upplevelse.
   

  

**Exempel på dina arbetsuppgifter**
* Hantera inkommande ärenden i Implemas kundportal
* Analys, felsökning samt rättning av enklare fel inom ditt kompetensområde
* Utföra service requests
* Eskalera ärenden om nödvändigt
* Delta i supportmöten
* Delaktig i att utveckla supportfunktionens arbetssätt, processer och våra tjänster


**Är du den vi söker?**
 Vi lägger stort vikt vid din personlighet och tror att du kommer från konsultverksamhet eller arbetat hos kund inom linjeverksamhet. Eftersom merparten av våra supportärenden innefattar Dynamics 365 F&O bör du vara väl insatt och ha ett intresse för produkten och dess möjligheter. Du kommunicerar obehindrat på svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift. Det är ett plus om du har erfarenhet av verktyg som exempelvis såsom JIRA, DevOps, Confluence etc.
   

  

 Som person tror vi att du är serviceinriktad, ansvarsfull och trivs som bäst i kontakten med kund. Givetvis är du kommunikativ och förstår vikten av tydlighet i varje dialog. Du motiveras av att arbeta i grupp och hitta synergier mellan olika kunder.
   

  

**Implema erbjuder dig**
 Välkommen in i en dynamisk organisation med en kultur och ett engagemang som kännetecknas av en stolthet och stark vilja att alltid driva arbetet framåt. Vi lovar dig en utmanande och varierande roll där du har möjlighet att både växa och vara med och påverka. Du kommer få möjlighet att kontinuerligt utbilda, fortbilda och certifiera dig i relevanta lösningar.
   

  

 Implema är en av Sveriges ledande specialister på att snabbt implementera affärssystem baserat på marknadens ledande affärssystem SAP och Microsoft Dynamics. Med mer än 20 års erfarenhet av affärskritiska projekt guidar Implema svenska och internationella företag till effektiva och hållbara affärsprocesser och den snabbaste vägen till framtidens affärssystem. Vi vill finnas nära våra kunder och har kontor på 10 orter runt om i Sverige. Idag är vi 200 medarbetare och omsätter 300 MSEK. Vi växer och vill bli fler!

title: Account Manager, Sweden or Netherlands
description:
**Account Manager (m/f/x) – Stockholm/ Sweden or The Hague/ Netherlands**
**About AvePoint**
 Securing the Future. AvePoint is a global leader in data management and data governance, and over 21,000 customers worldwide rely on our solutions to modernize the digital workplace across Microsoft, Google, Salesforce and other collaboration environments. AvePoint’s global channel partner program includes over 3,500 managed service providers, value added resellers and systems integrators, with our solutions available in more than 100 cloud marketplaces. To learn more, visit www.avepoint.com.
   

  

 At AvePoint, we are committed to investing in our people: we believe agility, passion and teamwork sets us up to do our best work and fosters a culture where you feel empowered to take initiative, learn from others and craft your career with the intention to unleash the power of you!
   

  

**Overview**
 Are you ready to take the next step in your sales career? As an Account Manager, you will be field based & working with existing customers as part of our Customer Success team to help them get the most out of their Microsoft Cloud investment. This role is a great opportunity to succeed as an account manager, working with our existing customers to help them use our products and solve new problems with our technology.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
 As an Account Manager your job is to work with a dedicated set of customers to be their key point of contact and drive revenue by identifying cross-sell/ up-sell opportunities and ensure a high retention on renewals. You will help them with any questions or issues they may, as well as build your relationships within the customer to identify new customer pain and business challenges. You will work with our team to successfully close deals by listening to your customers, understanding their problems and positioning innovative solutions using AvePoint products.
   

  

**Specific Responsibilities Include, But Are Not Limited To**
* Act as the single point of contact for existing AvePoint customers in your account patch
* Answer questions and helping to resolve issues in a timely manger
* Maintain and build relationships with existing key contacts
* Establish relationships with key customer business and technical advocates that have the power to drive long-term AvePoint solution adoption within their company
* Understand the customer’s business, their challenges, pains, and opportunities
* Present AvePoint solutions relevant to customer objectives
* Successfully facilitate solution discovery, solution overview, and technical deep dive sessions with customers (with technical support by Presales resources as required).
* Communicate with prospective customers, assist and guide them through their evaluation and selection process
* Participate in writing proposals in response to RFIs / RFPs that showcase how the AvePoint product line can satisfy customer requirements with attractive return on their investment
* Develop customer’s buying vision for how AvePoint can help them reduce costs and increase business agility
* Ownership of the commercial sale


**What You Will Bring To Our Team**
* University degree
* 4+ years of previous sales experience
* Come from a SaaS technology or past experience in the software/technology industry
* Excellent communication and listening skills – must be business fluent in English & local language (Swedish or Dutch - based on job location/ assigned territory)
* Determination to surpass performance goals
* Willingness to learn
* Ability to work individually and within a highly collaborative team environment
* Plenty of initiative
* A persuasive manner
* Ability to think on your feet


 AvePoint is proud to employ talent from many different backgrounds, experiences, and identities. We believe that diversity and inclusion drives our success and is at the core of how we hire, communicate, and collaborate to deliver value and excellence. We are committed to fostering an environment where people can bring their whole selves to work and feel a sense of belonging, and we continue to work toward creating a workforce that represents the diversity of our customers and communities.

title: Pre-Sales Solutions Engineer
description:
****About AvePoint:****
 Securing the Future. AvePoint is a global leader in data management and data governance, and over 21,000 customers worldwide rely on our solutions to modernize the digital workplace across Microsoft, Google, Salesforce and other collaboration environments. AvePoint’s global channel partner program includes over 3,500 managed service providers, value added resellers and systems integrators, with our solutions available in more than 100 cloud marketplaces. To learn more, visit www.avepoint.com.
   

  

 At AvePoint, we are committed to investing in our people: we believe agility, passion and teamwork sets us up to do our best work and fosters a culture where you feel empowered to take initiative, learn from others and craft your career with the intention to unleash the power of you!
   

  

****About The Position:****
 As the Pre-Sales Systems Engineer, You will partner with our account managers as the key technical lead throughout the sales lifecycle . Through this partnership, you will work in a consultative role to assist in the successful closing of new deals by performing technical presentations of AvePoint solutions and pre-sales support to our prospective and returning customers. This role is for someone who wants a role where you can utilize your technical expertise and customer facing skills in the dynamic tech industry? This position is your opportunity to succeed as a pre-sales professional, allowing you to work with state of the art software offerings. We’ll provide you with continuous training and mentorship to help you on your way to success as a sales engineer.
   

  

****Specific Responsibilities Include, But Are Not Limited To:****
* Presenting and demonstrating AvePoint’s product offerings relevant to customer objectives remotely and on-site
* Successfully facilitating Solution Discovery, Solution Overview, and Technical Deep Dive sessions with customers.
* Communicating with prospective customers, assisting and guiding them through their evaluation and selection process
* Building environments tailored to customer requirements as Proof of Concept during the sales lifecycle to illustrate product capabilities and how they align specifically with customer objectives
* Participating in writing proposals in response to RFIs / RFPs that showcase how the AvePoint product line can satisfy customer requirements with attractive return on their investment
* Sharing information with the sales and technical teams about our products and the market
* Helping the sales team identify and understand customer business objectives and organization to best align AvePoint technology
* Establishing relationships with key customer business and technical advocates that have the power to drive long-term AvePoint solution adoption within their company
* Developing customer’s buying vision for how AvePoint can help them reduce costs and increase business agility
* Supporting AvePoint Partner and Marketing teams with their online and in-person events including workshops, tradeshows, and webinars.
* Ownership of technical sales opportunity closure


****What You Will Bring To Our Team:****
* BA/BS Degree (Computer, Technology and Engineering majors preferred) OR 5 years of relevant work experience
* Confident and enthusiastic presentation skills
* Quick and self-motivated learner
* Advanced business and technical communication skills – can lead conversations to align technical value to client’s business needs
* Readiness to think strategically to help close deals using technical knowledge coupled with sales mentality
* Ability to maintain excellent relationships with customers and colleagues
* Ability to work individually and within a highly collaborative team
* Willingness to learn and adapt in a dynamic and fast changing environment
* Authoritative business analysis capabilities
* Advanced troubleshooting skills
* Excellent communication skills in Swedish and English


****Technical Qualities:****
* Experience in ITPro related topics such as server and software installation, configuration and administration, especially for Windows Server, Microsoft SQL Server, Dynamics CRM, SharePoint, Office 365 & Azure technologies
* Working knowledge of TCP/IP, DNS, Active Directory, SMTP, and DHCP technologies
* Working knowledge of Microsoft SQL Server, IIS, and Active Directory
* Understanding of Microsoft SharePoint architecture, components, and configuration, including the differences between SharePoint versions and hybrid architecture
* Broader knowledge of server and cloud offerings in the tech industry i.e. Office 365, Azure, AWS, Google Cloud is strongly preferred.


****About AvePoint****
 AvePoint is proud to employ talent from many different backgrounds, experiences and identities. We believe that diversity and inclusion drives our success and is at the core of how we hire, communicate and collaborate to deliver value and excellence. We are committed to fostering an environment where people can bring their whole selves to work and feel a sense of belonging, and we continue to work toward creating a workforce that represents the diversity of our customers and communities.

title: Senior Data Engineer
description:
**Description**
 We are Sinch. Join us and be a part of a global leader in Communication Platforms as a Service (CPaaS) and mobile customer engagement. With presence in more than 60 countries, we enable businesses to reach everyone in the world, through mobile messaging, email, voice, and video.
   

  

 We believe equal opportunities are the key to our success. No matter who you are, you’ll be able to explore career options, face captivating challenges, and build skills alongside outstanding people.
   

  

**The essence of the role**
 Join our team at Sinch as a Senior Data Engineer, where you'll be responsible for constructing, maintaining, and supporting data pipelines across our global product portfolio. Apply innovative ways and cutting-edge technologies in the market to excel in this role. We're seeking a candidate with a proven background in SQL, Python, and ETL/ELT that takes a proactive approach to address intricate challenges and craft data pipelines that not only empower the data domain but also enhance connectivity within Sinch through the effective use of data.
   

  

 This role is based in Stockholm, Sweden, and functions under a hybrid model, reporting to the Data Engineering Manager.
   

  

**As Our Senior Data Engineer, You Will**
 This role offers a distinctive chance for you to lead, drive, and implement impactful initiatives in a rapidly growing business. Our dedication to taking action is unwavering, acknowledging its importance not only for our esteemed customers but also for the greater global community.
   

  

* Lead data engineering projects, ensuring their successful delivery.
* Provide valuable support to leadership, serving as a technical authority for the team.
* Offer guidance to team members during code reviews to maintain high standards of quality.
* Promote best practices in data engineering within and beyond the team.
* Drive the data integration efforts across diverse platforms and products.
* Contribute to the development, performance, quality, monitoring, and maintenance of data pipelines.
* Identify areas for improvement in our products, business processes, and architecture through insightful data analysis.


**Who are you?**
 We believe you are a professional skilled in pipeline development and governance, with experience in tools for virtualization and a background in real-time data processing. Your organizational prowess is evident in breaking down projects efficiently, and your expertise extends to designing new data architectures with a focus on security standard processes. Your diverse skills make you a valuable asset, poised to drive innovative data solutions for our dynamic team and evolving business.
   

  

* Proficient in software development with expertise in Python, Spark, Git, CI/CD, and Docker.
* Skilled in using SQL for data querying and ETL/ELT development.
* Experience in structuring and storing large volumes of data in data lakes and warehouses.
* Capable of fixing and optimizing data pipelines for enhanced performance and reliability.
* Familiarity with data pipeline orchestration tools like Airflow, Dagster, and experience using Databricks.
* Cloud experience in AWS or GCP.
* Knowledgeable about various data architectures such as Data Lake, Data Mesh, and Data Fabric.
* Strong communication skills with fluency in English for engaging with stakeholders from technical and business areas.


**Ready to chase your dreams?**
 Join our data-centric organization by submitting your application in English.
   

  

 Together, let’s shape the future of data-driven innovation, where organizational data lies at the heart of what we do. Be a part of our global data team that promotes growth and embraces hybrid work arrangements.
   

  

 At Sinch, we value learning, adopt change, and offer opportunities for personal and professional growth. Unfortunately, we are not able to support relocation outside EU at present, therefore, will take into consideration only applicants who hold a Swedish or EU/EEA citizenship, or have a valid work permit for Sweden.

title: Strategic Transformation Director
description:
**Key Tasks**
* Act as an industry expert with the ability to exhibit deep domain knowledge in Manufacturing, particularly supply chain planning, to guide clients toward improved processes to drive profit, enhance resource effectiveness, and improve overall process efficiency.
* Use expert facilitation skills to lead clients to solutions and opportunities in the areas of business process, resource use and BY technology.
* Stay ahead of current industry best practices and operate as a thought leader in supply chain processes.
* Assist in driving major software and services sales by demonstrating the value of the proposed solutions and proposing a recommended roadmap to lead companies to greater success.
* Work with Principal and Senior Enterprise Architects on the Transformation ‘Blueprints’ including leading the blueprint phase in BY projects.
* Maintain close working relationship with sales, management, consulting, customer support and product management relating to securing and presenting appropriate proposal information to prospective clients and existing clients.
* Prepare and deliver presentations and publications for appropriate industry conferences and forums.
* Be a trusted advisor on complex, tier 1 manufacturing transformation programs.
* Be a leader - drive a proactive, cross functional culture across the BY Customer Success, Delivery organization.


**Our Values**
 If you want to know the heart of a company, take a look at their values. Ours unite us. They are what drive our success – and the success of our customers. Does your heart beat like ours? Find out here: Core Values
   

  

 Diversity, Inclusion, Value & Equality (DIVE) is our strategy for fostering an inclusive environment we can be proud of. Check out Blue Yonder's inaugural Diversity Report which outlines our commitment to change, and our video celebrating the differences in all of us in the words of some of our associates from around the world.
   

  

 All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or protected veteran status.

title: Account Executive, Midmarket (m/f/x) - Sweden
description:
**About AvePoint**
 Securing the Future. AvePoint is a global leader in data management and data governance, and over 21,000 customers worldwide rely on our solutions to modernize the digital workplace across Microsoft, Google, Salesforce and other collaboration environments. AvePoint’s global channel partner program includes over 3,500 managed service providers, value added resellers and systems integrators, with our solutions available in more than 100 cloud marketplaces. To learn more, visit www.avepoint.com.
   

  

 At AvePoint, we are committed to investing in our people: we believe agility, passion and teamwork sets us up to do our best work and fosters a culture where you feel empowered to take initiative, learn from others and craft your career with the intention to unleash the power of you!
   

  

**About The Position**
 AvePoint is excited to provide the opportunity for an Account Executive who is passionate about sales. You should apply for this role if you are ready to progress your sales career in the fast-growing tech industry? This position is your opportunity to becoming a high-earning sales executive in a rapid-growing industry. You provide the consultative sales mentality, and we’ll provide you with all the resources that you need to be successful.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
 As an Account Executive, your role is to identify and qualify sales leads, pitch our award-winning software solutions to medium-sized enterprises, and manage the full sales cycle.
   

  

* Developing new prospects and expanding existing accounts
* Managing complex sales cycles with a consultative sales approach
* Planning and delivering presentations that give prospective and existing customers insights into how our solutions solve their challenges
* Working with dedicated pre-sales engineers and other cross-functional team members to help close business
* Communicating new product developments to prospective and existing clients
* Attending remote and on-site meetings with clients
* Collaborating with teams in different territories and offices
* Handling opportunities prospected by our Account Specialist team
* Implementing and executing effective sales campaigns to ensure maximum penetration of key accounts within your territory
* Maintaining an accurate and current pipeline of opportunities within the CRM system


**What You Will Bring To Our Team**
 We look for people who value agility, passion and teamwork; those who can bring fresh ideas to the table and want the opportunity to learn, grow, and expand their careers. Bring your aptitude and build upon what you do best for our customers, partners, team, and you.
   

  

 You are tasked with bringing in new business. This means you are a creative thinker who is confident and self-motivated with an entrepreneurial mindset. You take pride in seeing your hard work pay off when you see the final results.
   

  

* Bachelor’s degree required
* 4+ years of previous sales experience
* Experience in the software/technology industry
* Experience with executive selling, both business and technical
* Excellent communication and listening skills – must be fluent in Swedish & English
* Determination to surpass performance goals
* Willingness to learn
* Ability to work individually and within a highly collaborative team environment
* Plenty of initiative
* A persuasive manner
* Ability to think on your feet


 AvePoint is proud to employ talent from many different backgrounds, experiences, and identities. We believe that diversity and inclusion drives our success and is at the core of how we hire, communicate, and collaborate to deliver value and excellence. We are committed to fostering an environment where people can bring their whole selves to work and feel a sense of belonging, and we continue to work toward creating a workforce that represents the diversity of our customers and communities

title: Windows server konsult
description:
Vi på B3 Cloud söker nu en kunnig konsult inom Windows serverdrift. I denna roll kommer du att vara aktivt involverad i olika projekt, där du spelar en avgörande roll för att förbättra, utveckla och underhålla våra kunders IT-infrastruktur. Ditt bidrag kommer att vara essentiellt för att vägleda kunderna i deras teknikval och införa ny teknik.
   

  

 Dina kvalifikationer:
   

  

* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av arbete med Windows Server.
* Erfarenhet av att designa och implementera större servermiljöer.
* Kompetens inom scripting, Active Directory, VMware, Backup och/eller erfarenhet av infrastruktur som kod.


 För att passa in i rollen bör du ha en bred teknisk kompetens inom Windows serverdrift, samt en god förståelse för säkerhetsaspekter. Du bör vara en person som ständigt håller dig uppdaterad inom området, ofta med ett säkerhetsfokus. Ditt lösningsorienterade förhållningssätt och din förmåga att ta initiativ för att förbättra och utveckla processer kommer att uppskattas. Vi värderar en arbetsmiljö som präglas av gemenskap, enkelhet och entreprenörskap.
   

  

 Extra meriterande är om du även har kunskaper inom System Centers ekosystem och förstår hur SCOM, SCSM, Intune och Orchestrator samverkar i ett service management-perspektiv.
   

  

 Om oss:
   

  

 B3 Cloud är experter på IT-infrastruktur och den digitala arbetsplatsen av morgondagen. Vi assisterar våra kunder i att flytta, utveckla och modernisera deras infrastruktur. Vi stöttar också i processen att förflytta IT-infrastrukturen från marken till molnet, där vi erbjuder tjänster som analyser, planering, migrering och förvaltning av IT-miljöer. Inom den digitala arbetsplatsen hjälper vi kunderna att uppnå modern samverkan och effektiv informationsdelning med Microsoft 365.
   

  

 Är du intresserad? Om du känner att detta låter som din nästa utmaning, skicka då in din ansökan idag! Har du några frågor eller funderingar om tjänsten, tveka inte att kontakta Melinda via mejl: melinda.andersson@b3.se.
   

  

**Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!**
 B3 Cloud, en del av B3-koncernen, är utsedd till Sveriges tredje bästa arbetsplats 2021 av Great Place to Work och till Sveriges IT Karriärföretag 2022. B3 Consulting Group är ett av Sveriges snabbast växande konsultföretag inom IT och management. Vi lever efter våra värdeord: erfarenhet, olikheter och energi, och satsar på hållbarhet i allt vi gör. Vi tror att medarbetare som mår bra presterar bättre, därför anordnar vi regelbundet aktiviteter inom wellness, från yoga och simning till musikquiz och föreläsningar om stresshantering och mental hälsa.

title: IT-arkitekt
description:
Beskrivning av tjänsten
   

  

 Vi söker dig som vill utvecklas i din karriär inom IT-arkitektur! Både våra kunder och vårt mångfacetterade Arkitekt-team på CGI letar efter ytterligare en kollega som delar vårt intresse för att skapa fantastiska lösningar för våra kunder.
   

  

 Är du utvecklare idag och vill ta nästa steg in i en arkitektroll? Då tycker vi att du ska söka den här tjänsten som IT-arkitekt hos oss på CGI!
   

  

 Dina framtida arbetsuppgifter
   

  

 I den här tjänsten får du möjlighet att jobba i olika typer av arkitektroller så att du får utvecklas inom den roll som du är intresserad av. Det finns bland annat möjlighet att utvecklas inom följande inriktningar:
   

  

* Lösningsarkitekt
* Enterprisearkitekt
* Informationsarkitekt


 Du kommer arbeta i nära samarbete med bland annat affärskonsulter, applikationsexperter, utvecklare och andra arkitekter. I uppdragen kommer du att vara en nyckelperson som bidrar till att aktivt driva och ta fram efterfrågat material så som lösningsförslag och icke-funktionella krav för att kunna ta viktiga beslut inom både arkitektur och teknik. Vi arbetar brett inom olika branscher och kunder, vilket också ger möjlighet för dig att utveckla dig själv och din kompetens.
   

  

 Som arkitekt blir du erbjuden ett mentorskap från andra seniora arkitekter som vägleder och stöttar dig i din framtida utveckling. Du ges dessutom möjligheter till den kompetensutveckling du eftersträvar, inte bara i kundleveranser utan också genom kurser och certifieringar. Du kommer in i en lyckad kombination av det stora företagets stabilitet och resurser, och det mindre teamets sammansvetsade energi och gruppanda.
   

  

 Du blir en del av ett härligt team konsulter med olika erfarenhetsnivå som alla delar ett brinnande intresse för arkitektur och lösningar. Vi gillar att samverka i en kreativ, positiv och energigivande miljö där samarbete, kontinuerligt lärande och att stötta varandra värderas högt i det dagliga arbetet.
   

  

 Kvalifikationer för att bli framgångsrik denna roll
   

  

 Du är en person som är redo att vidareutvecklas i rollen som arkitekt och vill ta nästa steg i karriären hos oss på CGI. Vi söker dig som har jobbat som lösningsarkitekt i minst 5 år och har en relevant högskoleexamen i bagaget.
   

  

**För den här tjänsten behöver du även behärska både svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.**
 Vi ser att du är en person som är driven och lyhörd samt nyfiken på att se hur långt du kan utvecklas. Rollen som konsult innebär en omväxlande vardag där du behöver ha en förmåga och drivkraft att bygga och utveckla goda relationer i syfte att skapa en stark samarbetsförmåga. För att framgångsrikt kunna lösa de utmaningar som du och ditt team ställs inför söker vi också dig med ett analytiskt tänk och en kreativ problemlösningsförmåga.
   

  

**Vill du veta mer?**
 Vad roligt! Kontakta då gärna mig, Peter Ravering, som är rekryterande chef för denna tjänst. Du når mig på: peter.ravering@cgi.com.
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig! Ansökningarna hanteras löpande, så skicka in din ansökan redan i dag! Tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse.
   

  

**Våra förmåner:**
* Aktieprogram och delägarskap: Som delägare har du möjlighet att påverka och i vårt aktieprogram matchar CGI ditt bidrag, krona för krona upp till 3% av din månadslön.
* Friskvårdsbidrag: Vi erbjuder ett årligt friskvårdsbidrag på 4 000 kr.
* Föräldralön: Vi betalar minst 90% av din lön under den första tiden hemma.
* Trygg anställning: Våra konsulter anställs med kollektivavtal och försäkringar.
* Pensionslösningar: Vi erbjuder attraktiva och förmånliga pensionslösningar.
* Personalbil: Personalbilen används som en privatbil men leasas av CGI
* Lön: Fast lönemodell


**Låt oss som ägare omvandla verklig insikt till handling – tillsammans.**
 Livet på CGI bygger på ägande, lagarbete, respekt och tillhörighet. Tillsammans med oss kommer du att kunna nå din fulla potential.
   

  

 Du är inbjuden att ta ägandeskap redan från första dagen i vårt arbete med att förverkliga vår dröm om att skapa en arbetsmiljö där vi trivs med att arbeta tillsammans och bidrar till framgången för vårt företag. Det är därför vi kallar oss CGI Partners snarare än anställda. Vi drar nytta av vår kollektiva framgång och tillsammans får vi möjlighet att aktivt forma vår företagsstrategi och inriktning.
   

  

 Ditt arbete skapar värde. Du kommer att vara med att utveckla innovativa lösningar och bygga relationer med medarbetare och kunder samtidigt som du får tillgång till globala möjligheter att skala upp dina idéer, omfamna nya möjligheter och dra nytta av gedigen bransch- och teknikexpertis.
   

  

 Du kommer att forma din karriär tillsammans med ett företag som är byggt för att växa och bestå. Du får stöd av ledare som bryr sig om din hälsa och ditt välbefinnande och ger dig möjligheter att fördjupa dina kunskaper och vidga dina vyer.
   

  

 Bli en del en av världens största leverantörer av IT- och affärskonsulttjänster.

title: Marketing Manager B2C SE
description:
**Marketing Manager B2C - Sweden**
*Are you an autonomous marketing specialist interested in playing a crucial role within a developing and progressive business? Join us as a Marketing Manager for the Swedish B2C market and take your career to the next level!*
 In the role of Marketing Manager for our Swedish B2C market at GlobalConnect, you will spearhead our marketing initiatives. This is a broad and strategic role where you will plan and coordinate campaigns, oversee digital marketing activities, and ensure alignment with our business goals. You will work a lot on your own, taking full responsibility for the Swedish market, while being part of a Nordic team. Your expertise in creating engaging campaigns, overseeing various platforms, and evaluating outcomes will be essential to achieving your goals.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Develop and implement marketing tactics aimed at enhancing brand awareness and stimulating interest among potential customers.
* Manage and optimize campaigns across various channels LinkedIn, Meta and our website platform.
* Monitor and report on key performance indicators (KPIs) such as website users, click-through rates, and online sales targets.


**Why Join Us?**
 At our company, you'll find a vibrant and innovative environment where you can grow and thrive. As a team of innovators, we are determined to influence the digital infrastructure industry in the Nordic region positively through innovative marketing strategies.
   

  

**Who are we looking for?**
 We desire a conscientious and accountable person who thrives when working on their own and is adept at controlling their own function. We're seeking a candidate with an extensive history in digital marketing, adept in technology, and with a sharp sense for design and content development. Analytical skills and a goal-oriented mindset are crucial for doing well in this position.
   

  

**To excel in this role, we believe you have:**
* Relevant higher education (BSc or MSc) in Marketing or Business Administration and 2-4 years of operational marketing experience.
* Comprehensive background in digital marketing and project management, familiar with Microsoft Office, Adobe Creative Cloud, WordPress, and Google Analytics, and ability to analyze data and extract insights.
* Experience in creating marketing content, working with social media and digital marketing together with comprehensive communication skills in Swedish and English.


 Do you have a keen interest in digital marketing and the desire to thrive in an impactful position, we eagerly anticipate your response. Join us and be part of an exciting journey as we grow and innovate in the Nordic digital infrastructure market. Apply now and let's create something amazing together!

title: Category Manager - Professional Services
description:
*Are you a strategic thinker with a knack for building strong vendor relationships? Do you thrive in dynamic environments and enjoy the challenge of managing procurement processes across multiple regions? If so, GlobalConnect has the perfect opportunity for you!*
**Role Description:** 
 As a Category Manager within Professional Services at GlobalConnect, you will play a crucial role in developing and implementing category strategies that drive profitability and value. You will manage procurement projects, oversee vendor selection, and negotiate contracts, ensuring our professional services portfolio is balanced and effective. Working closely with internal teams, you will align strategies and identify new business opportunities, all while building and maintaining key vendor relationships.
   

  

 Your expertise will be instrumental in spearheading consultant negotiations and ensuring our procurement processes are top-notch.
   

  

 On a typical day, you’ll start with a team check-in to discuss tasks and recent updates. Your day will be filled with supplier negotiations, stakeholder meetings, and preparing materials for executive presentations. You’ll need to navigate a diverse stakeholder landscape, achieve cost savings, and deliver value to our stakeholders.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Develop and implement strategies to increase profitability and value for the professional services category.
* Manage procurement processes, including vendor selection, contract negotiation, and execution.
* Collaborate with internal teams to ensure alignment and consistency in category strategy.
* Identify and pursue new business opportunities within the category.
* Build and maintain relationships with key vendors and partners.


**Why Join GlobalConnect?** 
 GlobalConnect Technology Procurement is a highly collaborative and fun team. We value high collaboration and adapt our leadership styles to fit the needs of our employees, providing more guidance to juniors and more autonomy to experienced team members. By joining us, you'll be part of a team that values your contributions and supports your professional growth.
   

  

**To succeed in this role, we believe you need:**
* Minimum 3 years of experience with procurement, preferably within Professional Services.
* Strong background in procurement and vendor management.
* Strategic thinking and strong analytical skills.
* Excellent communication and negotiation skills.


**About the Team and Work Environment:** 
 Our team consists of a mix of senior, mid-range, and junior procurement professionals based in Copenhagen and Stockholm, operating in a hybrid model. We value diversity in experience levels and gender, creating a supportive and inclusive environment.
   

  

 If you are passionate about procurement and vendor management and are looking for a role where you can make a significant impact, we encourage you to apply. Join us at GlobalConnect and be a part of a team that is dedicated to driving innovation and delivering exceptional value to our stakeholders.
   

  

 Apply today and let's embark on this exciting journey together!

title: Network Enterprise Architect with personnel responsibility to GlobalConnect!
description:
*Do you enjoy working in the borderland between execution and strategy? Do you have one ear to the ground picking up where the market and technology are going and both eyes on the execution of the strategy, tweaking it when necessary? Are you shining both as a senior Network Architect and as a leader for senior coworkers? Then this director-level position is right up your alley!*
**Role Description:**
 As a Network Enterprise Architect at GlobalConnect, you will be at the forefront of our technological innovation and strategic execution. Your typical day will involve developing, implementing and updating our Technology Strategy & Vision ensuring that our network infrastructure is future-proof and in line with the latest industry standards. You will interact with key suppliers to stay ahead of technology trends and ensure our network solutions are cutting-edge.
   

  

 You'll be leading a small two-man team of senior architects, guiding them through the complexities of fibre network technologies and operational strategies. This role demands a blend of deep technical expertise and servant leadership skills. You will be responsible for maintaining our Network Rulebook, developing new design rules, and making sure our strategic decisions are clearly communicated and understood across the organization. This will mean that you will travel regularly to build and maintain relationships with both technical and commercial teams and partners. One thing is certain and that is that many will look to you for answers & guidance.
   

  

 This position is vital in ensuring that our network solutions are not only robust and reliable but also innovative and forward-thinking. You'll be a key player in implementing our technology strategy, delivering on defined milestones, and ensuring interoperability across our network infrastructure.
   

  

**Responsibilities:**
* Implement and update the Technology Strategy & Vision
* Maintain and enhance the Network Rulebook (design rules).
* Engage with suppliers to stay updated on technology trends and roadmaps.
* Ensure the organization adheres to the strategic technology roadmap.
* Serve as a key advisor to the CTOO with frequent meetings, direct interactions and presentations.


**The Team and Culture:**
 You will be joining a skilled team of senior architects, each with their own unique perspectives and expertise. The team includes two experienced technical professionals based in Sweden, both contributing significantly to our network strategy. We enjoy an environment of collaboration, where your insights and leadership will shape the future of our network technology.
   

  

 GlobalConnect is committed to providing a work culture that values innovation, teamwork, and professional growth. We believe in giving our employees the autonomy to lead and the support to succeed. Your journey with us will be filled with opportunities to make a significant impact, drive change, and grow both personally and professionally. With a direct line of communication with our CTOO, we believe that you will get the leverage and influence needed to succeed, both as an advisor but also as a real influence in our organization.
   

  

**To succeed we think you need:**
* Leadership skills with the ability to motivate senior architects and influence stakeholders at all levels.
* Substantial experience as an architect within networks.
* Use to make technical roadmaps and strategies to execute on.
* Capability to obtain security clearance and an understanding of the security requirements surrounding critical infrastructure.
* Fluency in English.


**Why Join GlobalConnect?**
 At GlobalConnect, you will be part of a global and forward-thinking company that is shaping the future of digital infrastructure in the Nordics. We value innovation, collaboration, and the ability to make a meaningful impact. Your first 6months will be focused on understanding our strategic goals, building solid relationships within the team and across the organization, and setting the stage for long-term growth.
   

  

 Join us and be a part of a team that is not just keeping up with the future but actively creating it. Apply today and let's build something amazing together!

title: Projektledare Infrastruktur
description:
**Företagsbeskrivning**
  

**På AECOM levererar vi en bättre värld.**
  

 Vi på AECOM anser att en god infrastruktur skapar möjligheter för alla. Oavsett om det handlar om att förbättra din pendling, hålla ljuset på, ge tillgång till rent vatten eller att förbättra arkitektur så bidrar vårt arbete till att skapa bättre förutsättningar för samhällen och människor.
   

  

 Våra kunder litar på att vi använder de mest lämpade teamen, idéerna och tekniska kompetensen i vårt arbete inom transport, byggnader, vatten, miljö och förnybar energi. Vi är ett globalt etablerat företag - ca 50 000 anställda världen över - som drivs av ett gemensamt syfte och engagemang att leverera en bättre värld.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
  

 AECOM söker för närvarande en
 **Projektledare till vårt transportteam.**
  

 I din roll som projektledare kommer du bland annat att ansvara för och leda arbetet med att utveckla processen för leveranser inom projektet samt den övergripande hanteringen av delleveranser som successivt kommer att färdigställas i projektet. De kommer också att innefatta mer traditionella projektledningsuppgifter som: tidsplanering, kostnadsuppföljning, kvalitet, riskarbete, krishantering, osv.
   

  

 Du kommer att få möjlighet att arbeta med några av de mest intressanta infrastrukturprojekten i Sverige.
   

  

 Tjänsten passar dig som kan arbeta med en god grad av självständighet från dag till dag med uppgifter som omfattar skrivbordsstudier/genomförbarhetsstudier, markundersökningar och tolkningar till slutlig projektering.
   

  

 När du ansluter dig till oss kommer du att få kontakt och samarbeta med ett globalt nätverk av experter - planerare, projekterare, ingenjörer, forskare, konsulter, program- och byggledare - som leder förändringen mot en mer hållbar och rättvis framtid.
   

  

 På Stockholmskontoret kommer du att ingå i ett dynamiskt och växande team där du kan kombinera fördelarna med ett litet kontor på ett stort företag: självständighet, flexibilitet, global expertis och stabilitet.
   

  

 Här får du friheten att växa i en värld av möjligheter. Vi ger dig den flexibilitet du behöver för att prestera med hybridarbetsalternativ. Oavsett om du arbetar från kontoret, på distans i Sverige eller ute hos en kund kommer du att arbeta i en dynamisk miljö där din integritet, entreprenörsanda och ditt banbrytande tankesätt förespråkas.
   

  

 Viktiga arbetsuppgifter är bland annat:
   

* Representant för AECOM:s projektteam gentemot kunden.
* Ansvara för att arbetspaket levereras i tid.
* Samordning av AECOM:s tekniska chefer/samordnare (Sverige, Spanien, Storbritannien och andra platser).
* Identifiera och kommunicera övergripande kundkrav till AECOM:s konstruktionsteam och övervaka genomförandet av kraven.
* Samordna och vara värd för möten om kundprojektering
* Samordna tvärvetenskaplig verksamhet, såsom seminarier och gränssnittskontroller.
* Ansvara för uppföljning och rapportering av projektresultat.
* Hantera och kommunicera projektändringar.
* Kundförhandlingar om ändringar i omfattning och budget.
* Övervaka att kvalitetsförfaranden följs och dokumenteras inom respektive tekniska discipliner.
* Stöd till BD/Group Manager för marknadssektorn i samband med anbud.
  


**Kvalifikationer**
  

 Minimikrav
   

* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av projektledning av infrastrukturprojekt (vägar, järnvägar, försörjningsföretag).
* Utmärkt muntlig och skriftlig förmåga att kommunicera på både svenska och engelska.
* Driven och självständig.
  


 Kvalifikationer/erfarenhet:
   

* Multidisciplinär projekt- och konstruktionsledning.
* Erfarenhet av utveckling av detaljerad utformning och upphandlingsdokumentation (anbudskontrakt) för prestationsbaserade kontrakt och/eller kontrakt för konstruktion och byggande (AB04/ABT06).
* Erfarenhet av övervakning/uppföljning av byggarbetsplatser.
* Utbildning/erfarenhet i projektledning.
  


 Meriterande kvalifikationer:
   

* Kandidatexamen eller magisterexamen i civilingenjörsutbildning, PM/CM eller motsvarande.
  


 \
   

  

**Ytterligare information**
  

**Här får du friheten att växa i en värld av möjligheter.**
  

 Vi ger dig den flexibilitet du behöver för att kunna prestera med hybridarbetsalternativ. Oavsett om du arbetar från kontoret, på distans i Sverige eller ute hos en kund kommer du att arbeta i en dynamisk miljö där din integritet, entreprenörsanda och ditt banbrytande tankesätt förespråkas.
   

  

 Du kommer att hjälpa oss att främja en kultur av jämlikhet, mångfald och inkludering - en säker och respektfull arbetsplats där vi bjuder in alla att ta med sig hela sitt jag till jobbet och använda sina unika talanger, bakgrunder och sin expertis för att skapa förändrande resultat för våra kunder.
   

  

 Vi uppmuntrar dig att växa och utveckla din karriär hos oss genom våra tekniska och professionella utvecklingsprogram och mångsidiga karriärmöjligheter. Vi tror på ledarskap på alla nivåer. Oavsett var du befinner dig i organisationen kan du göra en bestående inverkan på de projekt du arbetar med, de team och kommittéer du går med i och vår verksamhet i helhet.
   

  

 Vi erbjuder konkurrenskraftiga löner och förmåner, välbefinnandeprogram för att stödja dig och din familj och de utvecklingsresurser du behöver för att avancera i din karriär.
   

  

 När du ansluter dig till oss kommer du att få kontakt och samarbeta med ett globalt nätverk av experter - planerare, projekterare, ingenjörer, forskare, konsulter, program- och byggledare - som leder förändringen mot en mer hållbar och rättvis framtid. Gå med oss och låt oss komma i gång.
   

  

**ReqID:** 
 J10107945
   

  

**Business Line:** 
 Transportation
   

  

**Business Group:** 
 DCS
   

  

**Strategic Business Unit:** 
 Europe & India
   

  

**Career Area:** 
 Program & Project Management
   

  

**Work Location Model:** 
 Hybrid

title: Service Designer
description:
Are you prepared to lead the charge in transforming cities and empowering private parking operators within an entrepreneurial and international environment? At EasyPark, we're on a mission to make cities more liveable, and we want you to be a key player in this journey.
   

  

 As a Service Designer, you'll be an integral part of our
 **Corporation Experience Team** 
 whose mission is to deliver the most effortless & integrable parking SaaS for companies and employees, to be more cost efficient and productive and contribute to sustainable urban development.
   

  

 Our goal is to create a seamless B2B Ecosystem that empower companies in a scalable, cost-efficient, fast, and automated way. A growth product design mindset is essential in reaching our goal.
   

  

 Our design team, currently consisting of 19 members, also aspires to broaden EasyPark's offerings into new markets. This presents significant potential to improve user experience and contribute to substantial business impact.
   

  

 The broader Product&Tecnology organization includes a genuinely diverse and distributed team of over 450 talented specialists in product, engineering, design, and analytics; located across Stockholm, Amsterdam, Basingstoke, Tallinn, Atlanta and more.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
 As a Service Designer at EasyPark, your main tasks involve collaborating cross-functionally to improve experiences for our B2B customers and also have a unique opportunity to shape how the service design competence is built and integrated within our organization. You'll work closely with both internal and external customers to gather insights. These insights will then be turned into clear customer journeys and design concepts for our products.
   

  

 You'll team up with other product designers, product managers, and developers to create new features and improve existing ones. This involves working on how information is organized, how users interact with our products.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Conduct customer discovery sessions to reveal insights, behaviors, and requirements.
* Play an active role in product discovery and take charge of the mitigation of usability risk.
* Collaborate closely with teams to harmonize services with user needs and corporate goals.
* Craft service blueprints, customer journeys, and user personas to guide product decisions.
* Generate, prototype, and refine new service concepts and solutions.
* Facilitate workshops and co-design sessions involving stakeholders and users.
* Ensure EasyPark's business goals match customer behaviors for exceptional experiences.
* Advocate for service design best practices and a user-centric approach and shape service design proficiency, influencing methodologies at EasyPark
* Analyze data to enhance products and evaluate service performance.


**Key Qualifications**
* You have 5+ years of experience in Service Design.
* Your strengths are in research, analysis and understanding processes.
* You can express complex ideas through flows and prototypes.
* Experience in collaborating within cross-functional teams, especially in a B2B/SaaS setting.
* You have experience in working with Agile development methods.
* You are proficient in designing workshops and facilitation skills to encourage collaboration and effective communication.
* You can work independently, planning and executing Discovery and conceptualisation projects with tangible results.


 This role is based in Stockholm.
   

  

**Life at EasyPark Group**
 We are a values-driven company with an international culture and a global presence. By providing an environment with space to grow and room for autonomy, we believe in encouraging and supporting our team members to take initiatives and act outside of their comfort zone. To have an open mind and embracing change is a part of our DNA. At EasyPark we are dedicated to maintaining an open culture where the voice of each person is heard, and we play as one team across the globe. Diversity is something we celebrate and we are committed to creating an inclusive environment for everyone.
   

  

**What We Offer**
* Flexible ways of working: combine working from home with working from the office, whatever is agreed on within your team.
* Digital global onboarding: three days to indulge in learning & connecting with fellow new starters across the globe.
* Pension, insurances & health reimbursement: A competitive pension, in combination with the basic package of insurances
* Proactive health support: your wellbeing is important to us, which is why we offer proactive medical support, all depending on your need.
* Mental well-being support via Blue Call
* Wellness reimbursement: 5000 SEK/year

title: Director of Product Marketing
description:
Our vision is to transform presentations, meetings and lectures by turning passive audiences into engaged contributors. We make this possible through our interactive presentation platform where the traditional presentation monologue becomes an inclusive dialogue. We believe in the power of together and that the most successful leaders listen to be heard.
 



  





 With Mentimeter, users become the best presenter they can be. Meetings become more productive, participants learn more and have fun whilst doing it.
 



  





 We have more than 300 million users and customers worldwide, on our way of making the world a better place, one presentation at a time.
 



  





 Mentimeter is already loved by 300+ million people globally and our customers are some of the largest and most innovative companies out there. This will give you, as a marketing leader, a unique opportunity to build and nurture a well-established team whilst working with a product that still has so much growth potential.
 



  





**The Role** 




 Marketing’s role at Mentimeter is quite unique and extremely powerful, the two main stakeholders are the Product Department and the Sales Department:
 


* Product, since our go-to-market mainly is PLG, putting product marketing in the driver seat of being the voice of the customer internally, and the voice of the product externally.
* Sales, since our customer journey goes from free -> self-service customer -> Enterprise customer. Today we have over 15 million registered leaders & 115 000 paying self-service customers in all countries in the world - in this database of 15 million registered leaders we have over 37 000(!) organizations that have over 20 registered leaders… a HUGE opportunity for scalable demand generation!



  





 As Director of Product Marketing, you will be the leader of Product Marketing in the Marketing Department and also part of the Marketing Leadership Team.
 



  





**What you will do!** 



* Coach & Lead the expanding Product Marketing team, currently consisting of 3 product marketers
* Build and validate value propositions, messaging, and proof points to drive internal and external positioning and awareness.
